mapper.select: select lobilist.id, lobilist.title, lobicard.title title_card, lobicard.description, lobicard.duedate from lobilist left join lobicard on lobilist.id = lobicard.listId order by lobilist.id
mapper.insert: insert into lobicard(id, title, description, dueDate, done, listId) values( lobicard_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{description}, #{dueDate},'false', #{listId})
mapper.select: select count(*) from lobiList where id= #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into lobiList(id, title, defaultStyle, items) values( #{id}, #{title}, 'lobilist-info','')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM lobicard ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
